title: R44406
content: The CRS report provides annotated descriptions of authoritative sources addressing gaps in cybersecurity education and training, as well as technology R&D for cybersecurity issues. The sources cover various topics such as scholarships, internships, workforce development, and R&D programs from government agencies, think tanks, academic institutions, and news organizations. The curr_chunk discusses funding for R&D programs from government agencies, including the NSF, DOD, and private industry.
